message:
Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'pattern' as follows:
type pattern =
  | PLiteral of literal [@ocaml.doc " true "]
  | PWildcard [@ocaml.doc " _ "]
  | PTuple of pattern * pattern * pattern list [@ocaml.doc " (1, 2) "]
  | PList of pattern list [@ocaml.doc " [a; b; c] "]
  | PConstructList of pattern * pattern [@ocaml.doc " a :: [b; c] "]
  | PIdentifier of id [@ocaml.doc " cool_variable "]

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'pattern' as follows:
type pattern =
  | PLiteral of literal [@ocaml.doc " true "]
  | PWildcard [@ocaml.doc " _ "]
  | PTuple of pattern * pattern * pattern list [@ocaml.doc " (1, 2) "]
  | PList of pattern list [@ocaml.doc " [a; b; c] "]
  | PConstructList of pattern * pattern [@ocaml.doc " a :: [b; c] "]
  | PIdentifier of id [@ocaml.doc " cool_variable "]

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'aexpr' as follows:
type aexpr =
  | ALet of unique_id * cexpr * aexpr 
  | ACExpr of cexpr
